attributes.action: Allow NHS hospitals to be controlled by the doctors and nurses that work in them and to have control over where funds are to be spent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I feel that the government has too much say in the runnunig of our hospitals and that they should be run by the staff that look after the patients well being. Not by politicians who don't even have any medical knowledge.

The trusts should be run by medical staff not accountants!
